description: This file contains utility functions for managing environment variable mappings across different frameworks. It includes functions to locate framework-specific templates, parse YAML configuration files, apply prefixes, and map environment variables between common and framework-specific names.

methods.name: Path get_template_path(framework: str)
methods.description: Returns the path to the environment template file for the specified framework.

methods.name: Tuple[Optional[str],Dict[str,str]] parse_template_file(template_path: Path)
methods.description: Parses a YAML template file to extract optional prefix and mapping dictionary.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] apply_prefix_mapping(common_env: Dict[str, str], prefix: str)
methods.description: Applies a specified prefix to all environment variables in a dictionary.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] map_common_to_framework(framework: str, common_env: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Maps a set of common environment variables to framework-specific variables based on the template.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] map_framework_to_common(framework: str, framework_env: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Maps framework-specific environment variables back to the common set according to the template.

methods.name: list get_supported_frameworks()
methods.description: Returns a list of available frameworks based on existing template directories.

ctags.name: apply_prefix_mapping
ctags.pattern: /^def apply_prefix_mapping(common_env: Dict[str, str], prefix: str) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: map_common_to_framework
ctags.pattern: /^def map_common_to_framework(framework: str, common_env: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: map_framework_to_common
ctags.pattern: /^def map_framework_to_common(framework: str, framework_env: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:$/
